name: F1 2015
detailed_description:
Race like a champion in F1 2015 - get closer than ever before to the experience of racing in the world’s most glamorous, exciting and prestigious motorsport. F1 2015 puts you in the heart of the action with a stunning new game engine that recreates the blisteringly fast and highly responsive racing cars of FORMULA ONE™ and features all-new ‘broadcast presentation’ that immerses you in the unique race day atmosphere. F1 2015 is the official videogame of the 2015 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™ and also features fully playable 2014 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™ bonus content. Compete as your favourite FORMULA ONE star in the new Championship Season and push yourself to the limit in the challenging Pro Season mode. Hone your skills in the new Online Practice Session, and then challenge your friends and racing rivals from across the world in Online Multiplayer.

• A STUNNING NEW GAME ENGINE – A brand new game engine, built from the ground up for the latest consoles and PCs allows players to experience FORMULA 1™ in unprecedented detail.

• THE MOST RELEVANT FORMULA 1 GAME YET – An earlier release in the racing calendar and with free digital updates set to keep the game up to date with the sport during the season, F1 2015 brings fans the most relevant FORMULA 1 videogame ever.

• THE MOST INCLUSIVE F1 RACING EXPERIENCE EVER – Featuring a naturally authentic purely physics-based handling model with enhancements and additions in over 20 areas, F1 2015 is designed to be player inclusive for both seasoned players and those new to the series.

• NEW GAME MODES – Immerse yourself in the new Championship Season, test yourself to the limits in Pro Season or use the new Online Practice Session to hone your skills before taking on rivals across the world in Online Multiplayer.

• BONUS CONTENT – Look back at last year’s exciting season and enjoy a fully playable 2014 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™ as bonus game content.

short_description: Race like a champion in F1™ 2015 A stunning new game engine and all-new ‘broadcast presentation’ puts you in the heart of the action.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Japanese*, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit or Windows 8 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 3.0GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 @ 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4th Gen Iris Graphics or AMD HD5770 or NVIDIA GTS450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: DirectX 11 Graphics Card Required Intel: 4th Gen Iris or Higher, Intel Iris Pro Series AMD: HD5770 or Higher, HD6770 or Higher, HD7750 or Higher, R7 250 or Higher, R9 Series Nvidia: GTS450 or Higher, GT545 or Higher, GT640 or Higher, GT740 or Higher, GTX900 Series
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit or Windows 8 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4770 or AMD FX 9370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 5th Gen Iris Pro or AMD R9 290 or Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Intel, the Intel logo and Iris are trademarks of Intel Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 / Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB NVIDIA 640 series card or better with driver version 364.19 or later (tested)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: AMD and Intel GPUs are not supported at time of release. Nvidia requires 364.19 or newer drivers.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 / Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970 series card or better with driver version 364.19 or later (tested)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: AMD and Intel GPUs are not supported at time of release. Nvidia requires 364.19 or newer drivers.

achievements.name: ach_stay_on_these_roads
achievements.description: Complete 50 clean laps in Quick Race mode.

achievements.name: ach_pole_position
achievements.description: Take 10 poles in Quick Race mode.

achievements.name: ach_points_mean_prizes
achievements.description: Score 75 Constructors' Championship points in Quick Race mode.

achievements.name: ach_pack_leader
achievements.description: Stay out in 1st place for 150 laps in Quick Race mode.

achievements.name: ach_its_all_about_time
achievements.description: Spend 180 minutes in total track time at Silverstone.

achievements.name: ach_pass_go
achievements.description: Complete 200 laps in Quick Race mode.

achievements.name: ach_stirling_job
achievements.description: Win 3 races at Monaco in Quick Race mode.

achievements.name: ach_one_aim
achievements.description: Meet or exceed a race objective given to you from the team in Championship Season.

achievements.name: ach_pole_sitter
achievements.description: Take pole position in Championship Season.

achievements.name: ach_podiums
achievements.description: Get a podium in Championship Season.

achievements.name: ach_clean_club
achievements.description: Complete a Championship Season race without colliding with another car or object.

achievements.name: ach_me_myself_and_I
achievements.description: Finish ahead of your team mate in a practice session in Championship Season.

achievements.name: ach_pole_trophy
achievements.description: Achieve the most poles within a Championship Season.

achievements.name: ach_champion
achievements.description: Win the Drivers' Championship in Championship Season on any difficulty.

achievements.name: ach_construction_time
achievements.description: Win the Constructors' Championship in Championship Season on any difficulty.

achievements.name: ach_elementary
achievements.description: Win the race from 22nd place on the grid in the 2014 Championship Season.

achievements.name: ach_master_and_commander
achievements.description: Get 14 wins in a single Championship Season to beat Michael Schumacher's record of 13 wins.

achievements.name: ach_grand_slam
achievements.description: Take pole, win the race, set the fastest lap and lead every lap in a Championship Season weekend.

achievements.name: ach_super_monaco
achievements.description: Drive a total of 78 laps at Monaco in Pro Season mode.

achievements.name: ach_hard_times
achievements.description: Complete a race in Pro Season mode.

achievements.name: ach_easier_than_expected
achievements.description: Place in the top 16 in qualifying in Pro Season mode 5 times.

achievements.name: ach_boiling_point
achievements.description: Reach 100 points in an online championship.

achievements.name: ach_online_winner
achievements.description: Win an online race.

achievements.name: ach_just_the_beginning
achievements.description: Complete an online race in the Beginner Hopper.

achievements.name: ach_standard_bearer
achievements.description: Complete an online race in the Standard Hopper.

achievements.name: ach_hard_boiled
achievements.description: Complete an online race in the Hardcore Hopper.

achievements.name: ach_number_5
achievements.description: Complete 5 online races.

achievements.name: ach_online_pony
achievements.description: Complete 25 online races.

achievements.name: ach_multiplicity
achievements.description: Complete 50 online races.

achievements.name: ach_one_with_car
achievements.description: Set a time at a Time Trial Event.

achievements.name: ach_keep_it_clean
achievements.description: Set a lap time at 5 different circuits in Time Trial in the dry.

achievements.name: ach_wet_wet_wet
achievements.description: Set a lap time at 5 different circuits in Time Trial in the wet.

achievements.name: ach_sweet_dreams
achievements.description: Set 30 clean laps at Singapore in Time Trial.

achievements.name: ach_from_russia_with_love
achievements.description: Set 50 clean laps at Sochi in Time Trial in a Marussia.

achievements.name: ach_phone_home
achievements.description: Set 50 clean laps at the Red Bull Ring in a Red Bull in Time Trial.

achievements.name: ach_sauber_wolf
achievements.description: Set 50 clean laps in a Sauber on any track in Time Trial.

achievements.name: ach_william_the_conq
achievements.description: Set 50 clean laps in a Williams on any track in Time Trial.

achievements.name: ach_ticket_to_ride
achievements.description: Set 100 clean laps in Time Trial on any combination of tracks.

achievements.name: ach_clean_sweep
achievements.description: Set a clean lap time for all circuits in Time Trial.

achievements.name: ach_three_of_a_kind
achievements.description: Win a race in Quick Race, Championship Season and Multiplayer mode.

achievements.name: ach_total_recall
achievements.description: Load a Mid-Session Save.

achievements.name: ach_final_lap_heroics
achievements.description: Win a race on the final lap, coming from behind.

achievements.name: ach_continental_circus
achievements.description: Drive at least 20 laps on a track in each continent, in any game mode.

achievements.name: ach_final_countdown
achievements.description: Drive 500 laps on European tracks in any game mode.

achievements.name: ach_f1_super_hero
achievements.description: Spend at least 600 minutes out on track.
